Welcome to the database of the International Arthurian Society! Your account with BIAS online has now been created. 
Your status is ### (## branch). Bibliographers are requested to enter new data. National Bibliographers are authorized to coordinate the work of the national secretaries. The International Bibliographer checks and edits data from all branches and then publishes them. The International Bibliographer may refer data back to the National Bibliographer who may refer back to the bibliographer.
Please follow this link to confirm this mail and enter a new password.
